content: the colors the fingering weight at a loose gauge p2tog = purl 2 together sl = slip_stitch purlwise sample used approx 50 yards total for two eyes decreases 1 kfb = knit into front then needles sized to work well with your yarn k2tog = knit 2 together into back of stitch decreases 1 × a set of double pointed needles dpns or a long increases 1 circular to use magic loop method rs = right side a yarn needle ws = wrong side some scrap yarn small fabric scraps or stuffing to stuff the eyes when attaching them to whatever you ll put them on and a foam head is helpful fck ice frog mod by lee meredith leedoesstuff com page 2 pattern switch to white yarn and begin working the row below starting with the number row beneath the last row you worked so the highest number was back half the last green row and now you ll count back down with green yarn co 8 sts join to work in the round from there eg if you ended with row 14 begin with round 1 k1 kfb four times 12 sts row 13 below skipping past row 21 14 round 2 k1 m1 k3 three times m1 k2 16 sts work like that downwards through the row below round 3 k all until x row have been worked in white round 4 m1 k2 eight times 24 sts round 5 k all only if using the optional red switch to red yarn and continue in pattern for turn to begin working back and forth in row x-1 more row you ll need to continue treating the needles as if you re working in the round for at least a few move to instructions below but when switching more row until it s opened up more from red to black if this is happening after the piece has been rejoined in the round slip the work row below stopping after a ws row at the first stitch of the first black round if it s meant point when the piece measures 4 5 5 across to be a knit stitch if the first stitch is k2tog bottom or however big you want your eyes then work that decrease in red slip the next row 6 ws p2tog p to last 2 sts p2tog 22 sts stitch then switch to black row 7 rs k4 m1 k2 eight times k2 30 sts switch to black yarn and continue in pattern down row 8 ws p all to row 1 at the end 7 sts remain row 9 rs k all row 10 ws p all row 21 rs k all row 11 rs k3 k3 m1 seven times k6 37 sts row 20 ws p all row 12 ws p all row 19 rs k3 k3 k2tog nine times k7 46 sts row 13 rs k all row 18 ws p all row 14 ws p all row 17
